### Question 1


```{r, echo=TRUE}
temp <- read.csv("TempPG.csv")

summer <- temp[, c("Year", "Summer")]

summer_ts <- ts(summer$Summer, 
                start = min(summer$Year), 
                frequency = 1)

summer_ar <- arima(summer_ts,
                   order = c(2, 0, 0)
                  )
summer_ar
```
X_t = ar1 X_t-1 + ar2 X_t-2 + Z_t
X_t - 7.1615 = 0.4297 (X_t-1 - 7.1615)  + 0.3466 (X_t-2 - 7.1615) + Z_t
$$
X_t = 7.1615 + 0.4297*Y_{t-1} + 0.3466*Y_{t-2} - 0.607
$$

### Question 2

```{r, echo=TRUE}

# Lab 6 Sample ACF
acf(summer_ts,
    main = "Autocorrelation Function (ACF) of Summer Temperatures")

# Lab 7 ARIMA ACF
arima_model <-  arima.sim(summer_ar,
                   model = list(c(0.4297, 0.3466)),
                   n = 100
                  )
acf(arima_model,
    main="ACF of Residuals from AR(2) Model")


```
